parse.title: Secrets of Middle-earth: Inside Tolkien's "The Hobbit"

wikitext.*:
{{stub}}
[[File:Secrets of Middle-earth- Inside Tolkien's "The Hobbit" cover.jpg|200px|right]]
'''Secrets of Middle-earth: Inside Tolkien's "The Hobbit"''' is a [[2003]] documentary directed, written and conducted by [[Bob Carruthers]]. It features art by [[The Brothers Hildebrandt]], music by [[Mostly Autumn|Mostly Autumn]], and interviews with [[Priscilla Tolkien]], [[John Tolkien]], [[Humphrey Carpenter]], [[Rayner Unwin]], [[Tom Shippey]] and [[Tim Hildebrandt]]. 

==External links==
